title: Rob Lowe Kristin Davis Holiday in the Wild Trailer Netflix
text:
Never underestimate the sheer power of the Netflix holiday film–industrial complex, which, in 2019 alone, will bring us six new films to binge over the yuletide season after we rewatch A Christmas Prince for the billionth time. (Who hurt you?) But for now, say hello to Rob Lowe, Kristin Davis, and a bunch of supercute elephants. The streaming service just debuted the trailer for Holiday in the Wild, which finds Davis playing a recently dumped Manhattanite who heads to Zambia to rediscover herself, only to be paired up with Lowe, her hot pilot who also happens to nurse elephants back to health. When they wind up spending a week together at the largest game reserve in Africa, there’s a 97 percent chance they smooch after an upsetting discussion about the ivory trade. “A lot of people come here to get lost,” he informs her, “so they can be found again.” You can watch it on November 1.

Related
description: Rob Lowe and Kristin Davis star in the trailer for Netflix’s “Holiday in the Wild,” which is its newest Christmas film.
